about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate software engineer dedicated to creating innovative solutions that make a difference in the digital world.

bio.title: My Story
bio.paragraph1: I'm a junior software engineer with a passion for backend development and artificial intelligence. Based in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, I specialize in building scalable, efficient systems that solve real-world problems.
bio.paragraph2: My journey in software development began with a curiosity about how technology can transform businesses and improve lives. I focus on creating robust backend systems, integrating AI solutions, and delivering high-quality code that stands the test of time.
bio.paragraph3: When I'm not coding, I'm exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or mentoring fellow developers. I believe in continuous learning and staying at the forefront of technological innovation.
